title: Greg Gets His Beard Trimmed By Andy - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 221
description:
Greg, Tim, and Nick talk about beards, burgers, and losing weight. (Released first to http://www.Patreon.com/KindaFunny Supporters on 02.23.18)

Time Stamps -

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
